arts.ttl: 'He is not that guy': Mikel John Obi says Chelsea should replace player who started vs Flamengo last night
arts.sum: The Stamford Bridge legend isn't sure the player can take the club to the next level...

arts.ttl: Nicolas Jackson apologises for sending off against Flamengo
arts.sum: The 24-year-old was sent off for raking his studs down the shin of Lucas Ayrton.

arts.ttl: Flamengo stun Chelsea in another big Club World Cup upset
arts.sum: Chelsea's tournament chances took a serious hit as they were outclassed and outplayed by Flamengo in Philadelphia. Here's what you need to know from Friday in the Club World Cup.

arts.ttl: Chelsea star issues apology to team-mates after FIFA Club World Cup defeat to Flamengo
arts.sum: Chelsea striker Nicolas Jackson had a 24th birthday to forget in Philadelphia as the Blues fell to a 3-1 defeat to Flamengo in their second outing at the FIFA Club World Cup

arts.ttl: Chelsea fans react to Liam Delap’s full debut as clear Nicolas Jackson message sent after Flamengo loss
arts.sum: One player made a good impression, the other - not so much...

arts.ttl: Flamengo 3-1 Chelsea: Player Ratings As Blues Collapse in Second Half
arts.sum: Tensions flared in the 11th minute when Moisés Caicedo made a sliding challenge on former Chelsea and Arsenal player Jorginho. Former Real Madrid, Manchester City and Juventus player Danilo put Flamengo in front three minutes later sending the support into a frenzy as Chelsea fans looked on stunned.

arts.ttl: Chelsea striker Nicolas Jackson is sent off just TWO MINUTES after coming off the bench against Flamengo in the Club World Cup
arts.sum: Nicolas Jackson was sent off for a reckless challenge just two minutes after coming off the bench in Chelsea's Club World Cup clash with Flamengo.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca reveals why he dropped Nicolas Jackson for Liam Delap against Flamengo - as John Obi Mikel compares the rival Chelsea forwards
arts.sum: Delap, who impressed with an assist off the bench against LAFC, almost scored inside six minutes as he forced a save from Augustin Rossi before Pedro Neto gave Chelsea the lead.

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Flamengo LIVE: Team news as Blues look to put one foot in Club World Cup round of 16
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca’s side could all but seal a place in the round of 16 with a win in Philadelphia

arts.ttl: How to watch Flamengo vs Chelsea for FREE with Club World Cup clash not on UK TV
arts.sum: With Chelsea set to take on Brazilian side Flamengo at the Club World Cup, here's the kick-off time, streaming details and Blues team news as Enzo Maresca prepares to make changes
